_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/erro.unknownparserstate: parser is in an unknown state.

_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/oper.___description___: Operator affixation. Prefixation, infixation, suffixation -> affixation. Affix - https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%90%D1%84%D1%84%D0%B8%D0%BA%D1%81, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Affix
Operators arity - unary, binary, ternary etc. Also holds prefix/postfix attribute for unary operators.
_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/oper.binary: Binary operator. Mutually exclusive with `ternary` and `nAry` flags. Can be combined with `unary`.
_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/oper.fixedaritymask: Mask to pick out fixed size arity.
_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/oper.nary: N-arity. Mutually exclusive with other arity flags.
_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/oper.ternary: Ternary operator. Mutually exclusive with other arity flags.
_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/oper.unary: Unary operator. Mutually exclusive with `ternary` and `nAry` flags. Can be combined with `binary`.

_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/oper.___description___: Operator associativity. Ассоциативность (от лат. associatio) — свойство операций, позволяющее восстановить последовательность их выполнения при отсутствии явных указаний на очерёдность при равном приоритете - left - приоритетнее
_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/oper.lefttoright: left-hand operator  (Left-to-right →) левая ассоциативность, при которой вычисление выражения происходит слева направо.
_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/oper.righttoleft: right-hand operator (Right-to-left ←) правая ассоциативность — справа налево.

_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/oper.requiresscopeornameleft: Requires scope operator or name (identifier) at left.
_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/oper.requiresscopeornameright: Requires scope operator or name (identifier) at right.

_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/pars.waitoperator: unary postfix operator, binary, ternary or n-Ary operator.
_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/pars.waitoperatororfunctioncall: binary, ternary or n-Ary operator or function call.
_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/pars.waitunaryprefixoporvalue: unary prefix operator, variable, function or literal.

_generated-enums_/marty/expressions/toke.functioncall: Parser is currently parsing function call arguments list.
